pegawai:
CREATE TABLE `pegawai` (
  `id_pegawai` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `nik` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `nama_lengkap` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `email` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `no_hp` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `npwp` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL,
  `foto_profil` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `id_ptkp` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_pegawai`),
  UNIQUE KEY `nik` (`nik`),
  KEY `id_ptkp` (`id_ptkp`),
  CONSTRAINT `pegawai_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_ptkp`) REFERENCES `status_ptkp` (`id_ptkp`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci
kontrak_kerja:
CREATE TABLE `kontrak_kerja` (
  `id_kontrak` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `id_pegawai` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `no_kontrak` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `jabatan` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `tanggal_mulai` date DEFAULT NULL,
  `tanggal_berakhir` date DEFAULT NULL,
  `jenis_kontrak` enum('TETAP','TIDAK TETAP','LEPAS','PART TIME') DEFAULT NULL,
  `bpjs_tk` decimal(15,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  `bpjs_ks` decimal(15,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  `dasar_upah` decimal(15,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_kontrak`),
  KEY `id_pegawai` (`id_pegawai`),
  CONSTRAINT `kontrak_kerja_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_pegawai`) REFERENCES `pegawai` (`id_pegawai`) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=12 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci
